price: I to što je nebeski svod osiguran Naše je djelo, a oni se ipak okreću od znamenja koja su na njemu.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā al-samāa saqfan maḥfūẓan wahum ʿan āyātihā muʿ'riḍūna
